description:
Retrouvez la qualité des prévisions météo de Météo-France sur votre application, pour toutes les communes de métropole, d’outre-mer et dans le monde.

INDISPENSABLES : la prévision de pluie dans l’heure sur votre commune, la vigilance météo, VOS observations en temps réel, l’animation radar...

** LES FORCES DE NOTRE APPLICATION **

- une interface remaniée pour rendre l’information plus claire et facilement accessible

- Devenez acteur de la météo avec l'observation participative

- Visualisez le temps qu’il fait EN CE MOMENT sur toutes les villes de France

- Zoomez sur la carte des prévisions pour la France

- Regardez les bulletins météo de Météo-France

- Animez les images radar et satellite (zoomables)

Sans oublier :

- Prévision de pluie dans l'heure (selon couverture territoriale)

- Prévision pour les 15 prochains jours en France

- Température ressentie, Indice UV, probabilités de gel ou de pluie, accessibles simplement

- Bulletins Montagne pour les Alpes, les Pyrénées et la Corse avec les informations Neige et Avalanches

- Bulletins Marine et sécurité pour les zones côtières

- Animations radar et satellite sur 3 heures zoomables

- Image satellite du jour commentée par les spécialistes de Météo-France

- Éphémérides avec heures de lever et coucher du soleil pour les villes de France (Métropole et Outre-Mer)


* PERSONNALISEZ VOTRE ECRAN D’ACCUEIL :

- Accédez directement aux prévisions météo sur la ville la plus proche (géo-localisation) ou sur l’une de vos villes favorites

* CARTE DE VIGILANCE :

En cas de vigilance, un clic sur la carte donne accès au bulletin national et à la liste des départements en vigilance (jaune, orange ou rouge). Par cette liste, accédez aux bulletins départementaux de vigilance.

Vous pouvez désormais accéder aux vigilances de l’Outre-mer, de l’Europe et des Etats-Unis

* CONFIGUREZ VOTRE WIDGET METEO FRANCE:

Créez et configurez le widget avec la prévision des 4 prochains jours sur la ville la plus proche (géo-localisation) ou sur l’une de vos villes favorites

* ASTUCES DE NAVIGATION

- Balayez verticalement l’écran pour faire défiler les blocs

- En mode de visualisation des prévisions par heure ou pour les 15 prochains jours, faites défiler horizontalement les heures ou jours, puis cliquez sur l’échéance qui vous intéresse pour en voir les détails

- Accédez à l’ensemble des fonctionnalités de l’application par le menu principal en haut à gauche.

- Mémorisez vos villes favorites d’un simple clic sur l’étoile à droite du nom de la ville consultée. Si la ville est déjà en favori, cela la supprimera de votre liste.

- Accédez au menu des favoris permettant de supprimer des favoris mais aussi de définir la ville de la page d’accueil et du widget (ville géolocalisée ou l’une de vos villes favorites)

- Contactez-nous via la rubrique Mon compte > vos remarques du menu principal. Vos retours nous aident à améliorer votre application

BEST KHMER WEATHER FORECAST APP FOR CAMBODIANS.

Khmer Smart Weather Forecast is an application that predicts what the atmosphere will be like in a particular area in Cambodia by using technology and scientific knowledge to make weather observations.

Features:
- 25 cities and provinces
- 5 days prediction
- Provides temperatures, wind speed, humidity, and a bunch more data 
- Khmer Language 
- Neat user interface 
- User interface adapt to the local time 

Get Khmer Weather Forecast now or you will regret it later.  

*Shoutout to vectorkh for beautiful vectors*

~ WEATHER DOESN’T HAVE TO BE BORING ~
The simple weather app that’s winning awards (Apple Design Award, Best Weather Apps) and impressing tastemakers (MKBHD, Fast Company).

~ PLAYFUL YET FUNCTIONAL DESIGN ~
Turn your daily weather forecast into a memorable experience with a next-generation user interface design inspired by 3D video games. Feel the rain, hear the thunder, and watch the wind blow across your screen in vivid detail.

~ TOP WEATHER SOURCES ~
Powered by local data from the best weather sources like Accuweather, Foreca, Apple Weather, and the National Weather Service for the most local, most accurate forecasts.

~ MORE DETAILED ~
Explore every aspect of the weather for rich details on temperature changes, air quality (AQI), pollen reports, cloud cover, visibility, wind direction, rainfall, humidity, UV index, and much more. 

~ MINUTE FORECASTS™ ~
Designed for precise forecasts down to the minute. Know exactly when the downpour will start or when the dark sky will clear.

~ WIDGETS ~
Bring real-time weather data to your home screen and lock screen with simple widgets. Get frequent updates on the day’s temperature, conditions, rain, air quality, UV index, and wind conditions as they happen.

~ SEVERE WEATHER ALERTS ~
Keep an eye on severe weather alerts and be prepared for the next heat wave, storm tracking, flood risk, hurricane, blizzard, and more.

~ MOON PHASES ~
Astronomical moon phases and illumination. It’s simple to see when the next full moon and new moon are expected.

~ AIR QUALITY & POLLEN ~
Prepare for the outdoors with air quality index (AQI) and pollen forecasts. See AQI scores and pollen levels over the coming hours or days.

~ CUSTOM APP ICONS & SKINS ~
Collect app icons and custom skins that change the design of the entire app to match your mood. New icons, skins, and artist collaborations dropping regularly to keep your routine fresh.

~ MINIGAME & SURPRISES ~
Say hello to Cloudburst to pass the time or see how many hidden surprises you can find.

~ FREE OR UPGRADE ~
!Weather™ is free to use for as long as you need. Upgrade for realtime widgets, faster forecasts, more in-depth weather data like AQI and pollen, free skins, app icons, and wallpapers.

~ SUPER !BORING ~
Become a member and unlock access to all 5 Not Boring apps, skins, app icons, wallpapers, and more. We’re 100% member-supported. No ads, no data tracking.

Plans: https://notboring.software/plans
Support: https://notboring.software/support

CARROT Weather is a crazy-powerful (and privacy-conscious) weather app that delivers hilariously twisted forecasts. 

** Winner of Apple's App of the Year, Apple Design Award, and App Store Editors' Choice. Featured by The New York Times, Good Morning America, CNN, Wired, & more! ** 

Overflowing With Personality
Choose one of five personalities for CARROT, from the straitlaced “professional” to the profanity-laden “overkill.” You’ll actually be looking forward to a torrential downpour just to see what your weather robot has in store for you!

Accurate & Detailed
CARROT’s super accurate weather data gives you lightning-quick access to your current, hourly, and daily forecasts. And the easy-to-read details screens are just dripping with with meteorological goodness. 

Privacy First
Your personal information, including your location data, will never be sold to third parties.

More Than A Weather App
Complete activities to strengthen your relationship with the homicidal A.I. Follow clues to track down 150+ secret locations. Unlock 80+ achievements. Film your own TV-news-style weather report videos. Or use Augmented Reality Mode to bring CARROT right into your living room.

Join Premium Club to unlock:

- More weather data sources, including Apple Weather, AccuWeather, and Tomorrow.io
- Notifications, including precipitation, weather alerts, and lightning strikes (where available)
- Lock & Home Screen widgets 
- Live Activities
- Apple Watch complications and background updates 
- Weather maps with next-hour radar, individual radar stations, and many different layers (where available)
- Customization of the entire user interface
- CarPlay app
- And so much more!

Don’t make CARROT angry. Download her now!

---

CARROT Weather uses auto-renewing subscriptions. 

Premium provides additional features like weather data sources, notifications, customization, widgets, and Apple Watch complications.

Premium Ultra includes all the features of Premium, plus rain, lightning, and storm cell notifications (where available), a CarPlay app, super-res radar, a weather maps widget, and quick data source switching.

Premium Family includes all the features of Premium Ultra, with the added benefit of being shareable with up to five family members via Apple’s Family Sharing service. 

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your App Store account settings after purchase. Cancellation of the current active subscription period is not allowed.

Terms of Use: http://support.meetcarrot.com/weather/terms.html
Privacy Policy: http://support.meetcarrot.com/weather/privacypolicy.html

Weather Today gives you a quick and easy overview of the current weather, live in your location. You can easily track the exact weather movements nationally and in your area. And thanks to our reliable 15-day weather forecast, you can make your plans easier.

Great Features
-Hourly forecast and Daily forecast—Provide weather forecast information for 24 hours and 7 days.
-Easy to receive the weather conditions in your current location, including the current temperature, detailed conditions, sunrise and sunset time.
-Realtime temperature, humidity, pressure and wind speed are all in the weather app.
-Change the unit of a condition that is familiar to you (e.g. temperature: Celsius or Fahrenheit).

Terms of Service: https://midtedc.com/Terms/
Privacy Policy: https://midtedc.com/Policy/

Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.

# Accurate Forecasts
Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.

# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.

# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.

# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.

# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.

# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.

# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.


***

Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).

Privacy Policy: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/eula

developer: Hefeng Internet Technology Beijing Co Ltd
description:
* Visualized Weather App!

* Visual Weather
Feel the global weather condition trends on QWeather's beautiful weather map.  Currently supported map layers include: temperature, pressure, humidity, cloud cover, aurora probability, wave height, sea surface temperature, CAPE, snow depth, dew point temperature, radar reflection, and many more, with more being added all the time.

* Time Machine
What was the temperature today last week? How many times did it rain last year? How many days are there heavy air pollution? Time machine takes you through weather data from the past.

* Smart Reminders
"Remind me if it rains in Beijing", a weather forecast set up exactly according to your setting, let you know for different weather in different cities, reducing useless notification.

* Global data
QWeather supports weather data query for millions of cities around the world. Even if you are drifting in the ocean one day, you can pull out your phone to check the sea surface temperature and wave flow direction :P

* Various kinds of weather
Real-time weather, up to 30-day forecasts and hour-by-hour forecasts, minute precipitation, weather warnings, real-time air quality and forecasts, historical weather, typhoons, tides, sunrise and sunset, moonrise and moonset, moon phases, etc... 

* All Platform
Supports iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, macOS (sold separately)

-----------------------

# You are a developer? Visit our develop website at https://dev.qweather.com/en/ 

-----------------------

# QWeather Pro Subscription Service

QWeather Pro Subscription unlocks all features, access to more beautiful weather layers, fun app icons, and no ads. Subscriptions include:
* QWeather Pro (yearly): $7.49/year
* QWeather Pro (monthly): $0.99/month


Please note:
1. Auto-renewal: When you subscribe to the QWeather Pro, your subscription will be automatically renewed and extended before each subscription expires.
2. Cancel at any time: You can cancel your subscription at any time by opening "App Store > Avatar > Subscriptions" and selecting "Cancel QWeather Pro subscription". If you cancel within 24 hours before the subscription expires, the App store will still bill you for the next subscription period.
3. Change the subscription term: You can choose to move from a monthly subscription to an annual subscription to enjoy more discounted offers. When you do so, you will pay for the new subscription period after the current subscription expires.

-----------------------

# Terms of Service and Privacy

We take your rights and privacy very seriously, please read the following terms carefully before you start using.

Privacy Policy: https://staticpages.qweather.com/en/legal/privacy.html
Terms of Service: https://staticpages.qweather.com/en/legal/app-tos.html

-----------------------

# Your feedback and suggestions are valuable information for us, any questions and ideas, feel free to contact us at: support@qweather.com

# Apple Design Awards Finalist
# Featured on the App Store
# App of the Day
# "Apps We Love" by Apple

Harness the Power of the Sun with Sunlitt:
your all-in-one tool for tracking the sun’s position, movements, and shadows, anywhere and anytime.

→ Follow the Sun’s Path and Position
Access precise, up-to-the-minute sun tracking data tailored to your location, anytime—even without an internet connection.

→ Analyze Sunlight and Shadows
Discover how sunlight interacts with shadows—perfect for architects, photographers, and outdoor enthusiasts.

→ Augmented Reality - AR
See the sun’s path in your environment and use the Monolitt to visualize real-time shadow movement directly in your scene.

→ Solar Events Times
Stay on top of important solar events like sunrise, sunset, golden hour, blue hour, solstices, and equinoxes with detailed timing information.

→ Map
Dive deeper with powerful tools like the Shadow Map and view the Sun’s Path over terrain or satellite imagery for a thorough visual analysis.

→ Landform Shadows
See how hills, mountains, and valleys affect sunlight by casting real shadows on the 3D map.

→ Monolitt Mode
Enjoy a simple yet engaging sun-tracking tool, perfect for daily tasks like finding a good parking spot, selecting a sunny picnic area, or getting the perfect tan!

Designed for creators & explorers, Sunlitt works seamlessly offline, syncs across all your devices, and offers:

 • Support for Apple Watch, iPad, Mac, and Vision Pro
 • Widgets for Lock & Home Screen
 • Notifications & Live Activities
 • App Intents and Shortcuts
 • Free access to essential sun-tracking features

Unlock even more with Sunlitt PRO:
Change the date, get twilight details, azimuth, altitude, shadow ratio, weather forecasts, shadows in AR, and much more.

Whether you’re a photographer, real estate professional, designer, or outdoor enthusiast, Sunlitt is your ultimate tool for tracking the sun’s journey in the sky.

Got feedback?
We’d love to hear from you! Reach us at hello@sunlitt.app

Loving Sunlitt?
Leave a review and share the love!

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula

My Earthquake Alerts is a powerful earthquake monitoring app which delivers all of the information you need, with push notifications included, all free of charge. It also includes a beautifully simple design optimized for the latest iPhone and iPad.

FEATURES
- Live earthquake map which can detect and track earthquakes from all around the world.
- Free earthquake alerts customized for you, with no restrictions.
- Powerful search feature to find earthquake history dating back to 1970!
- Beautiful & simple design - view the earthquake feed on a map and in a list.
- Find the exact location, the depth and the distance away from you.
- Uses information from a wide variety of earthquake networks, including the USGS and EMSC.
- Support for the latest iPhone and iPad models.

If you need information or notifications about the latest earthquakes near to you, download My Earthquake Alerts today. This version is ad-supported. It is similar to apps such as Quakes, MyQuake and QuakeFeed.

Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!
 
STAY INFORMED:
- Radar overlay shows the areas of rain, snow & mixed precipitation in high resolution and vivid colors right on the interactive map;
- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours; 
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover;
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm’s way.

KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need; 
- Receive push notifications whenever there’s a weather alert for the bookmarked location.

VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast;
- Current, today’s min & max and "Feels Like" temperature;
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info;
- Chance of Precipitation;
- Sunrise & sunset time.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer’s website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps; wind map; snow depth forecast; hurricane, wildfire, lightning trackers; detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.
Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

Get Clime Premium:
- Severe weather alerts for all saved locations
- Hurricane tracker
- Advanced precipitation forecast
- Lightning tracker
- Temperature map
- Rain alerts
- Air quality index
- Wildfire tracking
- RainScope
- Hourly forecast
- 14-day forecast
- Animated wind map
- Snow depth forecast 
- No ads 

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period. Meet Weather. The most beautiful weather app. Ever. Now available on the App Store.

Don't let bad weather take you by surprise! Whether it is cloudy, raining, snowing or even stormy outside, Weather will provide you with current weather conditions and forecast in your city and multiple locations all around the world.

Cold or warm weather, it will magically come alive on the crisp screen of your iOS device. You won’t even have to look out the window as Weather will make you feel like you are already outside!

This app contains subscription :
- You can subscribe for premium account with detailed forecasts, premium maps and no ads
- Subscription is from $12.99 USD monthly
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "one month" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster*. With extreme weather on the rise, prepare yourself for storms, hurricanes & wildfires. Track daily forecasts and receive live radar updates, storm alerts, & local precipitation updates.

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Receive your forecast updates and rest assured with our weather warnings. Severe weather is increasing - our severe weather alerts have you covered.

Plan up to 15 days in advance with forecasts from the World’s Most Accurate Weather Forecaster, so you can plan ahead with confidence*. Manage personal weather alerts, so you receive notifications that are important to you.

Download The Weather Channel to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.

The Weather Channel Features:

Today’s Weather Forecast:

- 15-minute forecast for rain intensity up to 7 hours in the future & radar on your homescreen
- Check weather forecasts up to two weeks in advance!
- Prepare for severe storms & hurricane season
- Monitor breathing conditions with our Air Quality Index forecast

Widget & Homescreen Features:
- Our smart widget offers more weather in detail at a glance and one-tap access to the forecast
- Check your local radar, get severe weather alerts in your area, and check the forecast for the next three hours on your homescreen

Additional Features:
- Detailed information on sunset times 
- Stay prepared during extreme weather events, hurricanes, and earthquakes with live breaking news alerts
---
Upgrade to The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience available. Exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced 72-Hour Future Radar
- and more!

You can cancel The Weather Channel subscription anytime through your App Store account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Privacy & Feedback
•Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy
•Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html
•If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at iphonesupport@weather.com

*The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster. According ForecastWatch, Global and Regional Weather Forecast Accuracy Overview, 2021-2024, https://forecastwatch.com/AccuracyOverview2021-2024, commissioned by The Weather Company.

**The Weather Channel is the Most Trusted News Source In America. According to a YouGov 2024 Trust in Media poll: https://today.yougov.com/politics/articles/49552-trust-in-media-2024-which-news-outlets-americans-trust


The Weather Channel® is a registered trademark of The Weather Company, LLC 2024

Experience the weather | Apple Design Award Winner

Prepare for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts. Stunning photos match your location, time of day, and current conditions. 

Favourite features:

-Get all the details: wind, pressure, and chance of precipitation.
-See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules.
-Browse interactive maps: radar, satellite, heat, and wind.
-Track all your favourite cities and destinations!
-Twice daily notifications help you be prepared, whatever the weather.

Helpful tips:

-Scroll down for detailed weather information.
-Tap the plus sign to add your favourite cities.
-Swipe left-to-right to move between locations.

What people are saying:

"It's a million impressive little things. It's the blurring of the background; it's the subtle parallax scroll when flipping between cities; it's the way the windmills spin faster or slower based on the actual current windspeed." - Greg Kumparak, TechCrunch 

Tell us what you think:

We are committed to building the best mobile experiences and would love to hear your feedback.  Let us know your thoughts by tapping "Send feedback" in the app menu.

钓鱼人专属的天气查询与钓况分析工具，精确到钓位的天气预测，融合 AI 智能分析与渔获档案管理，为钓友提供逐小时 × 未来14天的钓鱼指数预测与策略建议。更有钓点导航、渔具商城、钓友圈等丰富功能，是数百万钓鱼人信赖的智能出钓助手！
核心功能亮点
精准钓鱼指数
提供“逐小时 × 14天”钓鱼指数参考，融合温度、气压、风速风向、月相、潮汐等多因子
数据精确到钓点/钓位，真正为钓鱼场景而生
AI钓况分析卡片
发布渔获即自动生成AI分析卡片：包含鱼口预测、钓法建议、黄金时段推荐、装备匹配等
一键了解今天是否适合出钓，爆护机会如何把握
渔获记录&钓鱼图鉴
一键记录每次出钓：鱼种、钓点、时间、照片、天气情况全收录
自动生成个人出钓档案 & 渔获成长图谱
解锁图鉴成就、收藏鱼种，打造专属钓鱼履历表
潮汐 & 日月预测
提供全球潮汐时间+涨落分析
日出日落/月出月落/月相时间精确显示，把握“黄金钓口”
视频&百科知识库
钓鱼教学、路亚技巧、饵料调配、钓法进阶…应有尽有
小白进阶高手，从这里开始
附近钓点&渔具店
查钓点：黑坑、野钓、禁钓区全覆盖
找渔具：就近导航渔具店，出钓无忧
钓友圈互动
分享渔获照片，交流钓技技巧
点赞评论互动，让钓鱼不再孤独
鱼石中心&商城
看视频、做任务赚“鱼石”
可兑渔具、VIP福利、图鉴卡片等好礼
VIP会员服务说明
成为VIP，即可畅享以下专属权益：
解锁15天 × 24小时 × 钓点级钓鱼指数
使用 AI 钓况分析与黄金出钓时段推荐
拥有渔获图鉴成就系统、钓点归档功能
全场免广告体验，商城权益加成
订阅说明
提供「连续包月」与「连续包年」自动续费服务
付款：用户确认购买后，从 Apple ID 账户扣款
自动续费：在订阅到期前 24 小时自动扣费并延长有效期
可随时在【设置】-【Apple ID】-【订阅】中管理和关闭自动续费
协议与政策
用户服务协议：https://t.5cm.fun/xieyi.html
隐私政策：https://t.5cm.fun/yinsi.html
自动续费规则：https://t.5cm.fun/xufei.html
立即下载体验！
精准指数、AI分析、渔获成长图鉴一体化，为钓鱼人量身打造的智能钓鱼助手，让每一次出钓更专业、更科学、更有成就感！

Cyclono is an incredibly accurate wind forecast around the world!

We collect and analyze big data from various sources to provide you with high-quality wind forecasts. Try it and see for yourself!

You can also measure wind speed using your smartphone's microphone. Just point the microphone towards the wind. This is very useful when you are already on the spot.

We regularly add new spots with wind sensors. You can send us a request to add your favorite spot.

The application will be especially helpful community kitesurfers, windsurfers, surfers, yachtsmen and sailors around the world.

We are constantly getting better thanks to your letters, comments and suggestions.

We wish you a fair wind!

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

Cyclono offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$1.99 per month
$13.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

https://ostasoft.com/wind/terms

Read the privacy policy here -
https://ostasoft.com/wind/policy

A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION
While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts. 

WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY
A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.

MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS

- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast 
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture

Available global weather models and resolution: 
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA 
- ICON by DWD 

Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA 
- HRDPS by MSC 
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM


CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.

HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING
With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.

WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS
Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.

TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast 
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner 

WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime.

CHANGE THE TIME
In the settings, you can switch between ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time.’ To switch between them, click the ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time’ options on the clock's hour section.

ADD LOCATION ON APPLE WATCH
It’s handy to know that the first location added to your list is set as the location on your Apple Watch. To edit or change this, you can reorder the cities in your location overview on your iPhone.

CHANGE MY BACKGROUND VIDEO
Unfortunately, you can’t manually select a video to play as a background. The app selects a random video from a pool of weather videos that match the weather for the report you’re currently viewing.

The n°1 thermometer in the App Store, with over 5,000,000 downloads!

@Thermometer is the most accurate application in the App Store (down to a tenth of a degree).

Since 2009, @Thermometer is the ONLY application to give you the outside temperature to the nearest tenth of a degree, in line with your exact location, throughout the world and in real time.
To achieve this, @Thermometer uses multiple data sources from your surrounding environment and combines them together thanks to our own unique algorithms developed on our meteorological servers.

@Thermometer is NOT just another application that tells you the temperature in a nearby town, using hour-old – or even older - data...


Key characteristics of the application:

- Most accurate temperature in the App Store (down to a tenth of a degree)

- Temperature corresponding to your precise location anywhere in the world and in real time.

- Fast location identification and temperature display.  

- Multiple high-quality graphical themes (HD - Retina display) are available allowing you to choose the one best-suited to you.

app_name: Meteo - Previsioni by Centro Meteo Italiano
description:
Se cerchi un’applicazione Meteo gratuita, bella, rapida, facile da utilizzare, e soprattutto precisa e puntuale nelle previsioni del tempo, la nuova release dell’app “Meteo” del Centro Meteo italiano è l’applicazione che fa parte te ! 

Completamente rinnovata nel layout grafico e nelle funzionalità l’applicazione è stata progettata per rendere l’esperienza di navigazione dell’utente efficace, efficiente e soddisfacente secondo le tre “regole auree” dell’usabilità. 

“Meteo” del Centro Meteo Italiano offre previsioni del tempo ad alta affidabilità, riferite ai comuni, alle località di mare e montagna in Italia e nel Mondo, direttamente sul tuo smartphone o tablet Android, con informazioni fino a 14 giorni e aggiornamenti dati in tempo reale. 

Le previsioni giornaliere sono fornite anche con il dettaglio orario, per darti, ora per ora, il massimo delle informazioni, come lo stato del cielo, temperature minime e massime, venti, zero termico, quota neve e le allerte dei principali fenomeni meteorologici. 

La funzionalità “Meteo Viaggi" ti permette di calcolare il percorso per raggiungere una meta conoscendo in anticipo le condizioni meteo durante tutto il tragitto con gli orari dei passaggi. Tale funzione è valida anche per viaggi all'estero!
La funzionalità “Allerta Meteo” è stata completamente ripensata per una migliore fruibilità da parte dell’utente. Grazie al servizio di “allerte meteo” potrai essere comodamente aggiornato, in tempo reale, sulle condizioni meteo riguardanti gli eventi da te inseriti, attraverso la ricezione di notifiche push. Senza necessità di consultare le previsioni, la App di Centro Meteo Italiano ti avviserà in caso di fenomeni meteo interferenti con il tuo "evento".
Con la funzione “WebCam” potrai vedere in tempo reale lo stato del cielo dei diversi comuni italiani, consultando migliaia di webcam in continuo aggiornamento.
L'applicazione, infine, è completa di radar, satelliti e mappe previsionali, una finestra sui cambiamenti meteo in nowcasting o per scoprire gli scenari futuri. 
“Meteo” del Centro Meteo italiano ti permette inoltre di salvare le tue località preferite e di poterle scorrere comodamente in modalità “swipe”. L’applicazione è dotata inoltre di sistema di georeferenziazione per fornirti in maniera precisa e tempestiva le previsioni del tempo in base alla tua posizione. 

Applicazione ufficiale del sito www.centrometeoitaliano.it

LISTA INFORMAZIONI FORNITE:  

- Meteo Italia (8500 località+montagna). Esa-orarie. Fino a 15 giorni.  
- Meteo Estero (migliaia di città dal mondo). Fino a 7 giorni.  
- Meteo Viaggi (il meteo per il tuo viaggio)  
- Allerta Meteo (allerta meteo per le tua attività)  
- Notizie 
- Chat
- WebCam 
- Satelliti  
- Radar  
- Mappe modelli previsionali  
- Gestione località preferite (modalità “swipe”)
- Widgets
